strapiPost.title: Brighten Your Garden With A Hanging Basket
strapiPost.content:
Find a gorgeous hanging basket to make your home pop with color this spring during Peel Compton Foundation's annual fundraiser, the Hanging Basket Sale.

  • Great Gifts: Baskets cost $25 and can be pre-purchased online for pickup on May 11-13 at Peel Museum & Botanical Garden, just in time to surprise Mom with a gift this Mother's Day!
  • Preservation: All proceeds from the sale will support the preservation of Arkansas history and make beautiful botanical garden spaces accessible to Northwest Arkansas.

Pre-purchase your hanging baskets HERE.
